name: Awoken (Brand)
description:
Controls are 

-AD or left arrow key and right arrow key for movement

-Space for jump

-[ left square bracket to attack

This is a small game I made solo for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

This is my first public game jam submission.

I learned a whole lot during this week and am super keen to get into more of these type of things.

All of the Pixel Art was done by me in Aseprite.

Here are the links to the assets that are NOT mine -

Player Death = https://freesound.org/people/SoundFlakes/sounds/492492/

Enemy deaath = https://freesound.org/people/micahlg/sounds/413178/

Cave music = https://freesound.org/people/orginaljun/sounds/396960/

Combat music = https://freesound.org/people/Hoshi_Hana/sounds/395313/

Hit sound (player) = https://freesound.org/people/Anthousai/sounds/406562/

Ht sound (enemy) = https://freesound.org/people/BenjaminNelan/sounds/410364/

Font (Immortal) = https://www.1001freefonts.com/immortal.font
